description: Dual paths of gravitational control (Void) and stellar destruction (Constellation).

abilities.name: Gravity Well
abilities.effect: Pull all enemies within a 15-foot cone 10 feet toward you.

abilities.name: Weightless Step
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, you can move up to 10 feet in any direction, including vertically, without provoking attacks of opportunity.

abilities.name: Gravity Pulse
abilities.effect: You unleash a pulse of gravitational energy in a 10-foot radius. All enemies in the area must make a Might DC 12 check or be pushed back 5 feet.

abilities.name: Space-Time Slip
abilities.effect: As a reaction, when an ally within 30 feet takes damage, you can briefly bend space, reducing the damage they take by 1d6.

abilities.name: Vacuum
abilities.effect: As a major action, you create a localized vacuum around a single enemy. The enemy is silenced and cannot cast spells with a verbal component for 1 round.

abilities.name: Zero-G Field
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, you can create a 5-foot radius field of zero gravity. Creatures who enter the field or start their turn there must make a Might DC 12 check or become 'Floating', making them unable to make melee attacks.

abilities.name: Singularity
abilities.effect: Create a point of zero gravity in a 10-foot radius. Enemies in the area are Restrained and cannot take reactions. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Gravitational Pull
abilities.effect: You can target a single enemy and pull them 30 feet toward you. They must make a Might DC 13 check or be knocked prone. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Void Step
abilities.effect: You can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Warp Strike
abilities.effect: As a major action, you can teleport to an adjacent enemy, making a melee attack with Advantage. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Time Slip
abilities.effect: The damage reduction is now equal to 1d8 + your Essence attribute.

abilities.name: Event Horizon
abilities.effect: Create a powerful pull in a 20-foot radius. All enemies are pulled to the center and take 3d8 physical damage. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Galactic Shift
abilities.effect: Swap places with an ally or enemy within 60 feet. This ability can be used once per combat. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Black Hole (Mini)
abilities.effect: You summon a miniature black hole at a point within 60 feet. For 3 rounds, all enemies within a 15-foot radius must make a Might DC 14 check at the end of their turn or be pulled 10 feet towards the center. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Cosmic Anchor
abilities.effect: As a major action, you can temporarily 'bind' a target to a point in space. They cannot be moved for 3 rounds on a failed Might DC 15 check. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Black Hole
abilities.effect: Summon a miniature black hole that consumes all enemies in a 60-foot radius, dealing 8d12 force damage. The area is heavily obscured for 3 rounds. Usable once per day and costs 20 Resolve.

abilities.name: Quantum Lock
abilities.effect: As a major action, you can trap a single enemy in a localized time dilation field for 3 rounds. The enemy's speed is reduced to 0 and all attacks against them have a +2 bonus. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Void Prison
abilities.effect: You create a prison of pure force around a single enemy. The enemy is trapped and cannot act or move for 3 rounds. The prison has 50 Vitality and can be destroyed. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: The Great Filter
abilities.effect: As a major action, you can instantly remove one enemy from the battlefield for the remainder of the combat. The enemy must be of a lower CR than your character level and must fail a Might DC 18 check. This can only be used once per day and costs 20 Resolve.

abilities.name: Universal Collapse
abilities.effect: You create a massive gravitational singularity that pulls all enemies within 60 feet to the center. They are then crushed, taking 10d12 force damage. This can only be used once per day and costs 20 Resolve.

abilities.name: Starlight Bolt
abilities.effect: Hurl a bolt of condensed starlight, dealing 1d10 light damage. This attack ignores 1 point of the target's Damage Reduction.

abilities.name: Stellar Flare
abilities.effect: As a bonus action after a successful attack, the target must make a Mind DC 11 check or have their next action's attack roll have a -1 penalty.

abilities.name: Starfire
abilities.effect: As a major action, you unleash a flash of blinding light in a 15-foot radius. All enemies in the area must make a Mind DC 12 check or become 'Blinded' for 1 round.

abilities.name: Solar Beam
abilities.effect: You can fire a beam of energy at a single target, dealing 1d8 light damage.

abilities.name: Meteor Strike
abilities.effect: Hurl a small meteor at a single target, dealing 1d10 physical damage. This attack ignores the target's Damage Reduction.

abilities.name: Stellar Guidance
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, you can give a single ally a +1 bonus to their next attack roll.

abilities.name: Cosmic Ray
abilities.effect: Fire a beam of pure cosmic energy. Deals 2d8 force damage. This attack ignores all non-magical damage reduction. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Stardust
abilities.effect: You conjure a shower of stardust in a 15-foot radius. All enemies in the area take 2d6 light damage and have a -2 penalty to their defensive rolls for 1 round. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Supernova (Mini)
abilities.effect: You can target a point on the battlefield. All enemies within a 10-foot radius take 2d8 force damage. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Gravitational Collapse
abilities.effect: You summon a miniature black hole at a point within 60 feet. For 3 rounds, all enemies within a 15-foot radius must make a Might DC 14 check at the end of their turn or be pulled 10 feet towards the center. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Starfall
abilities.effect: Call down a shower of starlight. You can target one enemy three times or up to three different enemies. Each bolt deals 1d8 light damage. This costs 5 Resolve.

abilities.name: Supernova
abilities.effect: Target a creature. They take 4d10 light damage and a flash of light blinds all enemies in a 15-foot radius on a failed Mind DC 14 check. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Meteor Shower
abilities.effect: Call down a shower of meteors in a 30-foot radius. All enemies in the area take 5d10 physical damage. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Orbital Strike
abilities.effect: You can summon a beam of cosmic energy from the sky. The beam deals 4d8 light damage to a single target and all enemies within 5 feet of it. This costs 10 Resolve.

abilities.name: Judgment of the Endless
abilities.effect: Create a powerful aura of cosmic judgment. For 3 rounds, any enemy that hits you with an attack takes 4d10 force damage. Usable once per day.

abilities.name: Cosmic Storm
abilities.effect: You create a storm of meteors and starlight in a 40-foot radius. All enemies in the area take 5d12 damage and are stunned for 1 round. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Celestial Blast
abilities.effect: You unleash a devastating beam of pure starlight. It deals 6d10 light damage to all enemies in a 30-foot line. This costs 15 Resolve.

abilities.name: Starfall (Master)
abilities.effect: The damage of your Starfall ability is increased to 3d8 per bolt.

abilities.name: Galactic Nova
abilities.effect: You unleash a devastating explosion of stellar energy. All enemies in a 60-foot radius must make a Might DC 18 check or take 10d12 light and force damage and be pushed back 30 feet. This can only be used once per day and costs 20 Resolve.

abilities.name: Cosmic Rebirth
abilities.effect: You restore all allies within 60 feet to full Vitality and cleanse all negative status effects. The effect is instantaneous and usable once per day. This costs 20 Resolve.
